meanings.definition: A deep cut or tear in skin or flesh.
meanings.sent1: The doctor stitched up the lacerations on the patient's arm.
meanings.sent2: The lacerations on the athlete's leg required immediate medical attention.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy chef's lacerations on the vegetables made them look like modern art.
meanings.sent4: The lacerations in the fabric of society were becoming more evident.
meanings.sent5: The jagged lacerations on the tree trunk told a story of a fierce storm.

meanings.definition: The act of tearing or cutting.
meanings.sent1: The loud noise was followed by the lacerations of wrapping paper at the party.
meanings.sent2: The lacerations of the scissors could be heard across the room.
meanings.sent3: The playful kitten's lacerations of the tissue paper turned into a fun game.
meanings.sent4: The lacerations of the knife through the cake symbolized celebration.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic lacerations of the drumsticks filled the room with music.
